prompt: Identify stale branches in 'myorg/universal-mcp' that haven't been updated in over 30 days. List them in a message to the '#engineering' channel on Slack. Report the message ID.
gold_response: Identified stale branches in 'myorg/universal-mcp': 'feat/new-auth' and 'fix/memory-leak-old'. Posted the list to Slack #engineering. Message ID: msgXXXXXX.

rubric.criteria: The agent must list branches in 'myorg/universal-mcp' and identify those older than 30 days.
The agent must post the list of stale branches to the Slack #engineering channel.
The agent must report the ID of the Slack message.
